verbose_text: White pulp consists of an accumulation of lymphocytes, mostly B-cells; therefore, these results indicate that the knocked-in hIL6R can respond normally to human IL6 to cause B-cell differentiation and proliferation in white pulp in vivo in the same way as endogenous mouse Il6ra in wild-type mice.
evidence: knocked-in hIL6R can respond normally to human IL6 to cause B-cell differentiation
